field.name: set
field.field_description: Used with campaign_group_lookup_criteria_diplomacy_treaty_component_sets. A set is a group of campaign diplomacy treaty components that must all be in place to match the criteria. To specify that one of a group of campaign diplomacy treaty components must be satisfied use multiple sets with one component per set and one set per campaign group member.

field.name: must_match_self
field.field_description: If checked, this set only matches if the input contains the "self" faction. For example if this is group for determining the sea region control status then the self faction is the faction to determine the status for.

field.name: must_match_a_faction_with_no_components
field.field_description: If checked, this set only matches if the input contains a faction with no treaty components.
